description:
Whether you're on a consumer product (like Gmail, Search, Maps, Chrome, Android) or a business product (Google Ads, AdSense, Google Marketing Platform, Analytics), you take part in a complete marketing experience as you lead every facet of the product's journey. From determining positioning, naming, competitive analysis, feature prioritization and external communications, you help shape the voice of the product and help it grow a loyal consumer base. This means you work with a cross-functional team across sales, corporate communications, legal, webmasters, product development, engineering and more. In this role, you'll be involved with product marketing strategy.

Google Hire is an easy-to-use applicant tracking system (ATS) that integrates with Gmail, Google Calendar, and other G Suite apps to help businesses hire faster, smarter and more collaboratively. Google Hire makes it easy for teams to manage the hiring process from distributing jobs, to identifying and attracting candidates, to building relationships, interviewing and making offers.

In this role, you'll use your experience as an innovative content marketing strategist and editor to own and scale our content marketing program across content formats and distribution channels. You’ll work with a cross-functional team to shape our content marketing strategy from beginning to end. You’ll bring an expertise in content marketing strategy, writing, and editing, working with a team of writers and content producers to bring the content marketing strategy to life.

You have proven experience building SEO and thought-leadership focused content programs, and will take a strategic approach to content distribution and building audiences on different distribution platforms. You’ll be a doer, a thinker and a leader and will play a critical role in further establishing Google in B2B technology and innovation.

Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 4 years of experience as a content marketer, journalist, and/or editor.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience building positive ROI content marketing programs.
  • Experience with producing different types and formats of content from short and long form editorial to videos and webinars.
  • Demonstrated understanding of content distribution strategies across various channels and platforms.
  • Data-driven mindset and understanding of how to measure the performance of various types of content marketing programs.
  • Hypothesis-driven approach to growth and marketing.
  • Excellent writing, copy writing, editing, and communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Build and execute a content marketing strategy with the goals of driving product awareness, traffic, leads, and business growth for Google Hire.
  • Own the end-to-end process and project management for content development, including developing and maintaining editorial calendars and content project plans.
  • Determine metrics for ensuring the effectiveness of marketing content, and provide regular performance updates to stakeholders.
  • Oversee a team of content producers to manage content creation and distribution, edit and review content for depth, style, brand consistency, and voice.
  • Work cross-functionally with product and analytics, and with external partners or vendors to drive rapid, high-quality execution.
title: Content Marketing Manager, Google Hire
